pkgmetadata.longdescription: ---version: v0.12.0---# spangle[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/spangle)](https://pypi.org/project/spangle/)[![PyPI - License](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/spangle)](https://pypi.org/project/spangle/)A small and flexible ASGI application framework for modern web.Note: `spangle` is on pre-alpha stage, so any updates may contain breaking changes.## Getting Started### Install```shellpip install spanglepip install hypercorn # or your favorite ASGI server```### Hello world```python# hello.pyimport spangleapi = spangle.Api()@api.route("/")class Index: async def on_request(self, req, resp): resp.set_status(418).set_text("Hello world!") return resp``````shellhypercorn hello:api```## Features- Components with dependencies- Flexible url params- `Jinja2` built-in support- Uniformed API- Single page application friendly...and more features. See [documents](http://tkamenoko.github.io/spangle).## ContributeContributions are welcome!- New features- Bug fix- Documents### Prerequisites- Python>=3.9- git- poetry### Build```shell# clone this repository.git clone http://github.com/tkamenoko/spangle.git# install dependencies.poetry install```### Test```shellpoetry run poe test```### Update API docs```shellpoetry run poe doc:build```
